mapper.select: SELECT /* upload.xml : getUploads */ batch_log_id, batch_program_id, batch_name, success_yn, error_message, delete_yn, reg_date, upd_date FROM batch_logs WHERE 1=1 AND reg_date IN (SELECT MAX(reg_date) FROM batch_logs WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY batch_program_id) AND DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y') AND batch_program_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY success_yn, reg_date DESC
